entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 30%
